edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.connectfour.GUI

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.connectfour.GUI.Circle

  • public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object
    Circle draws a circle at the specified location and with the specified color.
    Version:
    CS56, Spring 2013, UCSB
    Author:
    Jake Dumont, Heneli Kailahi

        Constructor for objects of class Circle
